pyblockseis.wavelet.wfiltfn¶

wfiltfn(xi, wave_type)[source]¶

Wavelet transform function of the wavelet filter in fourier domain.

Parameters

  • xi (class:numpy.ndarray) – sampled time series.

  • wave_type (str) – wavelet function.

Return psihfn

mother wavelet function.

Rtype psihfn

numpy.ndarray
